titleStmt.title: Advice to the women and maidens of London shewing, that instead of their usual pastime, and education in needlework ... it were far more necessary and profitable to apply themselves to the right understanding and practice of the method of keeping books of account : with some essays, or rudiments for young beginners, in twelve articles / by one of that sex.
titleStmt.author: One of that sex.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
